headline: Enphase’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Enphase’s fourth quarter was marked by a decline in sales volumes and revenue, yet delivered results above Wall Street’s expectations, prompting a strong positive response from the market. Management attributed the outperformance to operational discipline, effective channel management, and U.S. customers accelerating purchases before the Section 25D tax credit expiration. CEO Badrinarayanan Kothandaraman highlighted that “the strong demand trends at the beginning of Q4 continued till the end of
